mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.comm_id AS "commId", a.commission AS "commission", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", a.status AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_commission_order( id, order_id, comm_id, commission, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time, status ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{commId}, #{commission}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_commission_order SET order_id = #{orderId}, comm_id = #{commId}, commission = #{commission}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
